CB1.name: CB1
CB1.question: Is this a new treatment start for the patient?
CB1.context: Treatment timeline section. Indicates initiation of new therapy for patient. Dependent on CB5.

T2.name: T2
T2.question: What is the month of the treatment start date?
T2.context: Treatment timeline section. Month of planned medication initiation for patient. Only if 'Start of treatment' selected.

T3.name: T3
T3.question: What is the day of the treatment start date?
T3.context: Treatment timeline section. Day of planned medication initiation for patient. Only if 'Start of treatment' selected.

T4.name: T4
T4.question: What is the year of the treatment start date?
T4.context: Treatment timeline section. Year of planned medication initiation for patient. Only if 'Start of treatment' selected.

CB5.name: CB5
CB5.question: Is this a continuation of therapy for the patient?
CB5.context: Treatment timeline section. Indicates ongoing therapy for patient. Dependent on CB1.

T6.name: T6
T6.question: What is the month of the patient's last treatment date?
T6.context: Treatment timeline section. Month of most recent treatment for patient. Only if 'Continuation of therapy' selected.

T7.name: T7
T7.question: What is the day of the patient's last treatment date?
T7.context: Treatment timeline section. Day of most recent treatment for patient. Only if 'Continuation of therapy' selected.

T8.name: T8
T8.question: What is the year of the patient's last treatment date?
T8.context: Treatment timeline section. Year of most recent treatment for patient. Only if 'Continuation of therapy' selected.

T9.name: T9
T9.question: Who is requesting this precertification?
T9.context: General information section. Identifies the individual or entity submitting the prior authorization request.

T10.name: T10
T10.question: What is the phone number for the precertification requester?
T10.context: General information section. Contact details for the precertification requester for follow-up.

T11.name: T11
T11.question: What is the fax number for the precertification requester?
T11.context: General information section. Contact details for the precertification requester for document submission.

T12.name: T12
T12.question: What is the patient's first name?
T12.context: Patient identification in the Patient Information section, essential for accurate record matching and verification.

T13.name: T13
T13.question: What is the patient's last name?
T13.context: Patient identification in the Patient Information section, crucial for accurate record matching and verification.

T14.name: T14
T14.question: What is the patient's date of birth (MM/DD/YYYY)?
T14.context: Patient identification in the Patient Information section, vital for age-based criteria and accurate record matching.

T15.name: T15
T15.question: What is the patient's street address?
T15.context: Patient Information section. Required residential address for patient contact and records.

T16.name: T16
T16.question: What is the patient's city of residence?
T16.context: Patient Information section. Required city for the patient's residential address.

T17.name: T17
T17.question: What is the patient's state of residence?
T17.context: Patient Information section. Required state for the patient's residential address.

T18.name: T18
T18.question: What is the patient's ZIP code?
T18.context: Patient Information section. Required ZIP code for the patient's residential address.

T19.name: T19
T19.question: What is the patient's phone number?
T19.context: Patient contact information in the Patient Information section for communication regarding the request.

T20.name: T20
T20.question: What is the patient's work phone number?
T20.context: Patient Information section. Secondary contact phone number for the patient.

T21.name: T21
T21.question: What is the patient's cell phone number?
T21.context: Patient Information section. Mobile contact number for the patient.

T22.name: T22
T22.question: What is the patient's email address?
T22.context: Patient Information section. Electronic contact information for the patient.

T24.name: T24
T24.question: What is the patient's current weight in pounds?
T24.context: Patient Information section. Patient's current weight, used for medication dosing calculations.

T25.name: T25
T25.question: What is the patient's current weight in kilograms?
T25.context: Patient Information section. Patient's current weight, used for medication dosing calculations.

T26.name: T26
T26.question: What is the patient's height in inches?
T26.context: Patient Information section. Patient's height, used for body surface area calculations for dosing.

T27.name: T27
T27.question: What is the patient's height in centimeters?
T27.context: Patient Information section. Patient's height, used for body surface area calculations for dosing.

T23.name: T23
T23.question: Does the patient have any known allergies? If so, please list them.
T23.context: Patient Information section. Critical clinical information for patient safety and medication selection.

T28.name: T28
T28.question: What is the patient's insurance member ID number?
T28.context: Insurance Information section. Primary identifier for the patient under their health plan.

T29.name: T29
T29.question: What is the patient's insurance group number?
T29.context: Insurance Information section. Identifies the group policy the patient is covered under.

T30.name: T30
T30.question: What is the name of the primary insured party?
T30.context: Insurance Information section. Identifies the policyholder, if different from the patient.

CB31.name: CB31
CB31.question: Does the patient have other health coverage?
CB31.context: Insurance Information section. Determines if coordination of benefits is required due to multiple coverages.

CB32.name: CB32
CB32.question: Does the patient not have other health coverage?
CB32.context: Insurance Information section. Determines if coordination of benefits is required due to multiple coverages.

T33.name: T33
T33.question: If the patient has other coverage, what is the ID number for that coverage?
T33.context: Insurance Information section. Sub-question dependent on CB31 (Yes). Provides ID for secondary insurance.

T34.name: T34
T34.question: What is the name of the patient's other insurance carrier?
T34.context: Insurance Information section. Sub-question dependent on CB31 (Yes). Identifies the secondary insurance provider.

T35.name: T35
T35.question: What is the name of the primary insured party for the other coverage?
T35.context: Insurance Information section. Sub-question dependent on CB31 (Yes). Identifies secondary policyholder.

T57.name: T57

T58.0.name: T58.0

T58.1.name: T58.1

T59.context: Prescriber Information section. Phone number for the office contact person for general inquiries.

T66.name: T66

T66.context: Product Information section. Standardized code for medical procedures, services, or supplies.

T67.name: T67

T67.context: Diagnosis Information section. Primary medical diagnosis code supporting the precertification request.

CB68.name: CB68

T69.name: T69
T69.question: What is the patient's other applicable ICD code?
T69.context: Diagnosis Information section. Sub-question dependent on CB68. Provides secondary diagnosis codes.

CB70.name: CB70
CB70.question: Has the patient had prior therapy with the requested product within the last 365 days?
CB70.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Inquires about recent use of the requested drug for patient history.

CB71.name: CB71
CB71.question: Has the patient not had prior therapy with the requested product within the last 365 days?
CB71.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Inquires about recent use of the requested drug for patient history.

CB72.name: CB72
CB72.question: Has the patient not had a trial and failure of any of the listed rituximab biosimilars?

CB73.name: CB73

CB73.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Sub-question if patient failed specific preferred rituximab biosimilar.

CB74.name: CB74
CB74.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Truxima (rituximab-abbs)?
CB74.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Sub-question if patient failed specific preferred rituximab biosimilar.

T75.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Date of unsuccessful treatment with a preferred biosimilar.

T76.name: T76
T76.field_label: Please describe the nature of the failure of the preferred drug
T76.question: Please describe the nature of the failure of the preferred drug for the patient.
T76.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Details clinical reason for prior preferred therapy failure (e.g., lack of efficacy).

CB77.name: CB77
CB77.question: Has the patient not had an adverse reaction to any of the listed rituximab biosimilars?
CB77.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Evaluates if patient had adverse reactions to preferred biosimilars.

CB78.name: CB78

CB78.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Sub-question if patient experienced adverse reaction to specific preferred biosimilar.

CB79.name: CB79
CB79.question: Has the patient had an adverse reaction to Truxima (rituximab-abbs)?

T81.name: T81
T81.field_label: Please describe the nature of the adverse reaction to the preferred drug

T81.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Details clinical reason for adverse reaction to previous preferred therapy.

T84.name: T84

CB83.name: CB83

CB83.context: Clinical Information (Initiation) section. Sub-question for specific preferred biosimilar contraindication details.

CB86.name: CB86
CB86.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Inflectra (infliximab-dyyb)?
CB86.context: Clinical history: Indicates if a trial and failure of Inflectra, a preferred biosimilar, occurred for this initiation request.

CB87.name: CB87
CB87.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Renflexis (infliximab-abda)?
CB87.context: Clinical history: Indicates if a trial and failure of Renflexis, a preferred biosimilar, occurred for this initiation request.

CB88.name: CB88
CB88.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Simponi Aria (golimumab)?
CB88.context: Clinical history: Indicates if a trial and failure of Simponi Aria, a preferred biologic, occurred for this initiation request.

T89.context: Clinical history: Specifies the date of trial and failure, important for assessing recency and treatment progression. Dependent on prior checkbox selection.

CB85.name: CB85

T96a.name: T96a

CB91.name: CB91

CB91.context: Clinical history: Indicates if the patient has not experienced adverse reactions to the listed preferred drugs.

T104.name: T104
